vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development District for MU-2 Mixed Use District uses on property zoned a GO(A) General Office District, on the south line of LBJ Freeway, between Noel Road and Montfort Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  (1) Approval, subject to a development plan and conditions; [and (2) approval of the termination of deed restrictions, as amended [Z72-269], as volunteered by the applicant]*
Recommendation of CPC:  (1) Approval, subject to a development plan, and conditions; [and (2) approval of the termination of deed restrictions, as amended [Z72-269], as volunteered by the applicant]*
Z223-305(MB)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on May 22, 2024 and is scheduled for consideration on June 26, 2024.
